description: T001 - Common Beech (Fagus sylvatica) - Crown reduce by up to 3m on south side that overhangs gardens of 90 and 92 HurlinghamRd - Remove deadwood - greater than 25 mmT002 - Arizona Cypress (Cupressus arizonica) - Crown reduce top down by 3m; Remove 2 lowest limbs that overhang low over smallgarden of 45 Foskett RoadT007 - European Lime (Tilia x europaea) - Crown reduce by up to 2m on roadside; Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian clearance; Localise pruning around street lamp to clear by 2mT008 European Lime (Tilia x europaea) - Crown reduce by up to 2m on roadside; Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian clearance; Localise pruning around street lamp to clear by 2mT009 European Lime (Tilia x europaea) -  Crown reduce by up to 2m on roadside; Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian clearance; Localise pruning around street lamp to clear by 2mT010  European Lime (Tilia x europaea) - Crown reduce by up to 2m on roadside; Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian clearance; Localise pruning around street lamp to clear by 2mT015 - Indian bean tree (Catalpa bignonioides) - Crown reduce back to the most recent points of reduction by up to 3m
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
